page.title: 08Religion.(2)
page.content: {St Josephs. -}Roman Catholic Church {Parishioners -}11,000 {Services -}Mass_Mon and Sat 8 a.m. Tues,Wed & Thurs 10 a.m. Sun 10a.m. and 5.30 p.m. 300 attend Mass on Sundays.Some groups in the parish are,a keep fit club, overs 60's,Scouts and Cubs,and a mother and toddler group. Important feast days in the year are Christmas,Epiphany,Palm Sunday,Good Friday,Easter Day and all Saint days and many other religous days. St Josephs celebrates Mass every day,he visits his parishioners,he may have a funeral or a weding or a meeting to attend.Sometimes he is called out in the middle of the night to a very sick parishioners or a patient in the near by hospital. by Stephen Harrison
